Rank.Description: Increases your Block by 0.5%.
Increases your Block by 1%.

Increases your Block by 3%.

Increases the damage reduction when blocking by 2%. Reduces damage taken from Spells by 6%.
Increases the damage reduction when blocking by 3%. Reduces damage taken from Spells by 9%.

Ability.Description: Enables Guard. Increases Armor by 3% and all Resists by 9%. Maximum active Shield buffs: 1. Does not stack with Accord of Resilience. Lasts 1h

Rank.Description: When active, Heroic Visage increases chance to block and hit.
Increases the damage of Pacifying Strike, and Righteous Blow by 5%. Your Pacifying Strike also reduces the damage you take by 1% for 15s.
Increases the damage of Pacifying Strike, and Righteous Blow by 10%. Your Pacifying Strike also reduces the damage you take by 2% for 15s.
Increases the damage of Pacifying Strike, and Righteous Blow by 15%. Your Pacifying Strike also reduces the damage you take by 3% for 15s.
Increases Damage of attacks and heals that generate Attack Points by 2%.
Increases Damage of attacks and heals that generate Attack Points by 4%.
Increases Damage of attacks and heals that generate Attack Points by 6%.
Increases Damage of attacks and heals that generate Attack Points by 8%.
Increases Damage of attacks and heals that generate Attack Points by 10%.
Unlocks Light's Hammer, a damaging ranged strike that also stuns the target.
Increases the duration of Aggressive Block by 2 seconds, and the damage bonus of Aggressive Block by 1%.
Increases the duration of Aggressive Block by 4 seconds, and the damage bonus of Aggressive Block by 3%.
Increases the duration of Aggressive Block by 6 seconds, and the damage bonus of Aggressive Block by 5%.
Increases your Base Health by 2%.
Increases your Base Health by 4%.
Increases your Base Health by 6%.
Increases your Base Health by 8%.
Increases your Base Health by 10%.
Increases damage of attacks that must follow a Block by 3%, in addition to increasing all threat generated by 3%.
Increases damage of attacks that must follow a Block by 6%, in addition to increasing all threat generated by 6%.
Increases damage of attacks that must follow a Block by 9%, in addition to increasing all threat generated by 9%.
Increases your Resistances by 2%.
Increases your Resistances by 4%.
Increases your Resistances by 6%.
Attacks that must follow a Block deal an additional 20% of your Endurance as Life damage.
Attacks that must follow a Block deal an additional 40% of your Endurance as Life damage.
Attacks that must follow a Block deal an additional 60% of your Endurance as Life damage.
Reduces the cooldown of your Light's Balm and Light's Blessing by 1 second.
Reduces the cooldown of your Light's Balm and Light's Blessing by 2 seconds.

Ability.Description: Increases damage by 25%. Maximum active Shield buffs: 1. Lasts 1h.

Rank.Description: Increases the number of enemies hit with Sweeping Strikes, Judgment and Light's Decree by 1.
Increases the number of enemies hit with Sweeping Strikes, Judgment and Light's Decree by 2.

Ability.Description: Stuns up to 5 enemies up to 20 meters in front of the Paladin for 3s. Awards 1 Attack Point.

Rank.Description: Each successful block has a 10% chance of increasing Attack Points by 1.
Each successful block has a 25% chance of increasing Attack Points by 1.
For 15 seconds after you block an attack, your damage is increased by 2%. This effect can stack up to 5 times.
For 15 seconds after you block an attack, your damage is increased by 5%. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 4%.

Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 8%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 10%.

Increases the healing of your Light's Balm and Light's Blessing by 6%, in addition to increasing Life damage by 12%.
Increases threat from attacks that must follow a Block further based on Endurance and reduces the cost of these attacks by 50%.
Reduces the cooldown of your Touch of Life and Life's Rapture by 10 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of your Touch of Life and Life's Rapture by 20 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of your Touch of Life and Life's Rapture by 30 seconds.

Ability.Description: For the next 12s, incoming heals are increased by 15%. This does not effect Touch of Life or Life’s Rapture.

Rank.Description: Allows You to have 2 active Shield buffs, and increases Base Health by 5%.

Ability.Description: The Warrior takes 35% less damage for 10s. Shares a cooldown with Crest of Entropy. Does not stack with Aegis of Light, Crest of Consumption, or Power Shield.

AbilityRank.Description: The Warrior takes 35% less damage for 10s. Shares a cooldown with Crest of Entropy. Does not stack with Aegis of Light, Crest of Consumption, or Power Shield.
Increases damage by 25%. Maximum active Shield buffs: 1. Lasts 1h.
Reduces incoming damage by 20% for 4s. Heal up to 5 group or raid members within 35 meters for 217. Does not stack with Shield Defense or Crest of Entropy.
Heals for 1027 to 1135.
Deals 1376 to 1521 Life damage to up to 5 enemies. Must be used after the Warrior has Blocked.
Deals 2412 to 2412 Life damage over 15s. Must be used after the Warrior has Blocked.
Increases damage by 25%, reduces damage taken by 5%, and increases healing received by 5%. Lasts 1h.

Deals Life damage to the enemy. Reduces damage taken by 7%. Lasts 15s:

Heals for 1540 to 1702.

Stuns up to 5 enemies up to 20 meters in front of the Paladin for 3s. Awards 1 Attack Point.
Damaging abilities generate additional threat based off of the Warrior's Endurance.
Charges at the enemy, dealing 2774 to 3066 Physical damage. Roots for 1.5s. Awards 1 Attack Point.
Increases Block by 5%. Maximum active Shield buffs: 1. Lasts 1h.

Increases Endurance by 1.5% per point spent in the Paladin soul. Increases Armor by 1% per point spent in the Paladin soul. Increases Resistances by 2% per point spent in the Paladin soul. Base Damage is increased by 0.5% for each Point spent in the Paladin Soul.
Forces the enemy to attack the Warrior for 3s.

Shields the ally, intercepting 50% of the damage they receive, and replacing the ally's Toughness with the Warrior's, for 6s. An ally can only be affected by a tank soul damage intercept once every 2 minutes.
Restores full health.

Deals Physical damage:
1 Point: 1090 damage. 2 Points: 1644 damage. 3 Points: 2483 damage.

Deals 1026 to 1135 Physical damage to up to 10 enemies. Generates significant threat. Awards 1 Attack Point.
Deals 1149 to 1270 Physical damage. Must be used after the Warrior has Blocked.
Reduces damage taken by 10% and restores health equal to 100% of the Warrior's Maximum Health over 6s on up to 10 party or raid members. The Warrior heals this value instantly.
Stuns for 3s.
Interrupts.
Deals 773 to 855 Physical damage. Increases the Warrior's Block by 3%, and damage done by attacks that must follow a Block by 5% for 15s. Awards 1 Attack Point.
Finishers gain a bonus to Attack Power contribution based on how many Attack Points were consumed.
Deals 2469 to 2729 Life damage to up to 4 enemies. Causes all single target abilities against the enemy to deal an additional 172 damage to up to 5 other enemies. Lasts 12s. Awards 1 Attack Point.
Deals 1248 to 1380 Physical damage. Awards 1 Attack Point.
Forces up to 10 nearby enemies to attack the Warrior for 3s.
